unicorns.name: Citrine Spark
unicorns.description: She is always singing, and loves her pet bluejay, Sam. Look for her humming him a quiet tune.

unicorns.name: Comet Tail
unicorns.description: He loves to watch for shooting stars at night. Look for him playing on the monkey bars.

unicorns.name: Clear Sky
unicorns.description: She loves rollercoasters, especially upside down ones. Try to find her upside down.

unicorns.name: Breezy Night
unicorns.description: He loves going to the movies and eating buttery popcorn. Look for him in a dark theater.

unicorns.name: Firelight
unicorns.description: He loves disco music and nachos! You might find him at the rollerrink on dance night.

unicorns.name: Luster Dawn
unicorns.description: She is a master of karaoke, and has a giant scarf collection. She is often found singing.

unicorns.name: Fuzzy Mint
unicorns.description: She loves peanut butter and pickle sandwiches. Keep an eye out for her in the local cafe.

unicorns.name: Starlight Glimmer
unicorns.description: She has a giant handbag collection and is always trying new recipes. You might track her down hunting for ingredients.

unicorns.name: Trixie
unicorns.description: She makes a mean cheesburger, and loves to read. You might find her cooking over a campfire.

unicorns.name: Twilight Velvet
unicorns.description: She is a whistling champion and has a pet duck, Sandy. Look for her by a pond with Sandy and his friends.

unicorns.name: Amethyst Star
unicorns.description: She loves burritos and playing her guitar. You might find her strumming along in a quiet nook.

unicorns.name: Lemon Hearts
unicorns.description: She loves riding her bike and decorative napkin folding. She is often exploring new trails.

unicorns.name: Neon Lights
unicorns.description: He is a fan of hanging out at the beach and roasting marshmellows. You may find him taking a nap in the sand.

unicorns.name: November Rain
unicorns.description: He loves to eat eggplant and go squaredancing. He is quite shy, but you might find him hiding in the shadows of a tall tree.

unicorns.name: Amber Spring
unicorns.description: She likes country music and going for a hike. If you look carefully, you may find her on a shady trail.

unicorns.name: No Unicorns
unicorns.description: Doesn't look like there are any unicorns today. But try searching again soon!
